<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Alglenweis (Princess of the Rime)](/Deities.aspx?ID=171)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Sarkorian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=15)

**Edicts** Strive to perfect an art or craft, protect the monuments of your people, stir others into action

**Anathema** Destroy an artistic creation without providing something in its place, refuse to act if called upon

**Follower Alignments**
NG, CG, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [War Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=46)

**Domains** [Cold](/Domains.aspx?ID=41), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=51)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Agitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=566)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54)

- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47)

</column>
name: Alglenweis (Princess of the Rime)
